title: io.vertx.core.http.HttpServerRequest.HttpServerRequest not initialized if called after a @RestClient invocation
body:
### Describe the bug

A exception is thrown if the HttpServerRequest is called after the @RestClient invocation.

javax.enterprise.inject.IllegalProductException: Normal scoped producer method may not return null: io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.CurrentVertxRequest.getCu
rrent()

https://github.com/agelbess/quarkus-bug-http-headers

### Expected behavior

Should not be thrown

### Actual behavior

A exception is thrown if the HttpServerRequest is called after the @RestClient invocation.

### How to Reproduce?

https://github.com/agelbess/quarkus-bug-http-headers

Clone and run the tests.

More info in the https://github.com/agelbess/quarkus-bug-http-headers#readme

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`
